notes: "Translate Sivakumar's real-world banking reasoning into structured cognitive pillars"
"Map each cognitive pillar to its functional module and design clear data flows"
"Define architecture for Agent Hub (MCP Host + Wrapper)"
"Outline hosting topology, data flow, service dependencies, and Cloud Run environment settings"
"Convert human reasoning into machine-readable logic blocks: objectives, formulas, heuristics, decision trees. Ensure every rule remains deterministic and editable."
"Create prompt templates written in Siva's natural voice and outreach style. No generative improvisation — engineered templates with fixed doctrine and variable placeholders."
"Encode the mathematical and logical scoring framework: Q-Score formula (quality × signal × reachability), Segmentation logic, Edge-case rules"
"Define the customer journey state machine (COLD → APPOINTMENT_SET → FIRST_BUSINESS → TRUST_ESTABLISHED → REPEAT_BUSINESS). Each state contains its outreach intent and transition triggers."
"Develop the reasoning output format that explains why each score or decision was made. Design UI schema for 'Why this score' breakdowns in the Hiring Signals drawer."
"Establish feedback loop between outreach outcomes and scoring adjustments. Define metrics, storage, and analytics queries for continual learning."
"Implement multi-agent reasoning (DiscoveryAgent, ValidationAgent, ScoringAgent, OutreachAgent, CriticAgent). Ensure reflection dialogue stays within deterministic bounds and preserves Siva's logic."
"Score individual leads (person + company combination) for display priority. Identify which contacts are most actionable within each company.
